summary: This document is a trading authorization form from Deutsche Bank Wealth Management, allowing an agent to buy and sell securities on behalf of the undersigned. It outlines the responsibilities and liabilities associated with the trading activities conducted by the agent.
keyFacts: The document authorizes an agent to trade securities on behalf of the undersigned.
The undersigned agrees to indemnify Deutsche Bank for any losses arising from these transactions.
The authorization remains in effect until revoked by the undersigned in writing.
The document emphasizes that the agent's actions are binding as if the undersigned had acted themselves.
There is a mention of Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. as a subsidiary of Deutsche Bank AG.
